subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Vanderbilt Coach Bobby Johnson had no doubt how his Commodores would react, even if many others did, after last week’s disheartening loss to Georgia. “It made us a little angry,” he said.
snippet: Vanderbilt Coach Bobby Johnson had no doubt how his Commodores would react, even if many others did, after last week’s disheartening loss to Georgia. “It made us a little angry,” he said.
